Comment 1: 
The rules for when a function terminates are precisely spelled out in the spec
(http://golang.org/ref/spec#Terminating_statements) so this is not a gc bug.

When considering whether the spec should be changed, you can get the result you want by
simply omitting "true", so I don't think there is anything to do here.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
